title: Structural Analysis Fundamentals

author: Prof. Emily Zhang

description: Explores form, space, and function in building design.

title: Lighting and Acoustics in Buildings
author: Prof. Richard Neutra

title: Thermodynamics Made Simple
author: Dr. James Maxwell
description: Explains laws of thermodynamics with real-world applications.

title: Mechanical Vibrations

description: Core fluid principles applied to mechanical systems.

title: Engineering Mechanics: Statics and Dynamics
author: Prof. Irving H. Shames
description: Fundamentals of force systems, equilibrium, and motion.

title: Introduction to Manufacturing Processes
author: Dr. Kalpakjian Serope
description: Covers machining, casting, forming, and automation basics.

title: Power System Analysis
author: Dr. John J. Grainger
description: Explains generation, transmission, and distribution systems.

author: Prof. Bhimbra P.S.

author: Dr. M. S. Naidu

title: Electric Power Distribution
author: Prof. A.S. Pabla

author: Dr. Godfrey Boyle
description: Intro to solar, wind, and hybrid power technologies.

title: Digital Logic Design
author: Prof. M. Morris Mano
description: Covers logic gates, circuits, and sequential design.

title: Communication Systems
author: Prof. Simon Haykin

title: Rock Mechanics

author: Prof. B.A. Wills

author: Dr. John Hustrulid

author: Dr. Hougen and Watson

title: Transport Phenomena

title: Robotics and Automation

title: Control Systems Engineering
